journals.name: PLOS One
journals.citation: Champie A, Grandmaison AD, Jeanneau S, Grenier F, Jacques P, Rodrigue S (2023) Enabling low-cost and robust essentiality studies with high-throughput transposon mutagenesis (HTTM). PLoS ONE 18(4): e0283990. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0283990

manuscript_citation: Champie A, Grandmaison AD, Jeanneau S, Grenier F, Jacques P, Rodrigue S (2023) Enabling low-cost and robust essentiality studies with high-throughput transposon mutagenesis (HTTM). PLoS ONE 18(4): e0283990. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0283990

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working
